text: Halt and Catch Fire is an American historical drama television series. It was shown on television channel AMC in the United States from June 1, 2014, to October 14, 2017. The series had 40 episodes and 4 seasons. Main actors of the program include Lee Pace, Scoot McNairy, Mackenzie Davis. == References == Category:American drama television series Category:2014 American television series debuts Category:2017 American television series endings
title: Halt and Catch Fire
